DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect moxifloxacin QT/QTc interval healthy male subject . Moxifloxacin positive control drug use QT study . In study , moxifloxacin 400mg 800mg use , get information effect moxifloxacin QT/QTc interval .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Study Investigate Effect QT/QTc Interval Moxifloxacin After Single Dose Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect moxifloxacin QT/QTc interval healthy male subject . Moxifloxacin positive control drug use QT study . In study , moxifloxacin 400mg 800mg use , ( therapeutic supratherapeutic dos ) get information effect moxifloxacin QT/QTc interval healthy Korean male subject .
DOC.criteria: healthy male subject age 20 40 screening subject weight 50 kg ideal body weight range + 20 % subject decide participate voluntarily write informed consent form subject acute illness within 28 day investigational drug administration subject clinically significant disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinological , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological ( central nervous system ) , psychiatric disorder malignant tumor subject determine eligible screen test ( medical history , physical examination , 12lead ECG , laboratory test , etc ) within 28 day study start clinically significant allergic disease ( except mild allergic rhinitis ) systolic blood pressure > = 140 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure > = 90 mmHg , heart rate > 100 bpm < 50 bpm result 12lead electrocardiogram include : QTcF > 450 msec PR interval > 200 msec < 110msec Evidence second thirddegree atrioventricular ( AV ) block Pathologic Q wave ( define Qwave > 40 msec depth > 0.5 millivolt Evidence ventricular preexcitation , leave bundle branch block ( LBBB ) , right bundle branch block ( RBBB ) Intraventricular conduction delay QRS > 120 msec risk Torsade de pointes long QT syndrome , family history sudden death , heart failure , hypokalemia Subjects consider unsuitable inclusion investigator
